attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the last 6-8 years, house prices have gone through the ceiling.

Most houses have more than doubled. As a first time buyer in London (in my mid thirties), I'm having to relocate and commute from the Midlands to London, to buy a decent house.

I don't want to buy "affordable housing"

I propose ideas such as the following.

Not allow an unregistered landlord/agent to have more than 2 owned properties - thus increasing supply.

Increased house building.

Increased levies on buy to let owners (without passing rental costs onto a tenant)
